articles.author: Sakura Murakami, Yoshiaki Nohara
articles.title: Japan, China, South Korea Meet as US Tariff Pressure Rises - Bloomberg
articles.description: Japan and China held their first economic dialogue in six years in Tokyo on Saturday, an event aimed at reducing tensions between the Asian giants as they face trade pressure from the US.
articles.content:
Japan and China held their first economic dialogue in six years in Tokyo on Saturday, an event aimed at reducing tensions between the Asian giants as they face trade pressure from the US.
